page.title: 02A Day in a Child's Life.
page.content: I woke up at 8.30am.I did not have any breakfast.I got dressed in my best jeans.I went outside onto our drive.I got the bus to York with my mum & Jamie my brother.In York we got off the bus and went to our club called Explorers.At the club we do drawing or collages.We had a break at St.Johns College for dinner. Then we did some drawing.After Explorers we did some shopping then we went home.For tea I had sausage,bacon,mashed potato and peas.Then I went upstairs to write my story about a dwarf.Then I watched Wonder Woman on the television.I had a cup of coffee.I watched some more television.At 9.00pm I went to bed.
